originalText.text:
Horrible customer service! Don’t buy anything at VB, you pay a lot of money, clothes are sent with defects, and you won’t get your money back even though you sent back the product.

Seeing all the negative feedback, I wish I checked before buying. Well I guess, as long as the Mrs Beards are soaking in luxury, they don’t care about their customers.

originalText.text: This review is for online VB (not NY store). Absolute worst customer service ever. Ordered four items, received three. Packing slips for two boxes showed three items shipped. Called said one item was missing, was told to file a police report (WTH?). Nothing stolen??? Then was told an inquiry with fedex would be opened. Why? FedEx delivered the sealed boxes. Super rude girl said that’s the policy. I emailed and attached packing slips showing only three items were packed. Bella responded and attached a fedex label to return the items (WTH?). I just wanted my fourth item! Fourth item showed up a day later (yay). Wait one item doesn’t fit need to return it. Bella has marked all four items as returned (WTH?). Call again Bella says will send you a new FedEx label. Me: still marked returned will be a problem. Bella: I’ll look out for it. Hmmmm returned item, delivered on may 31, called again, emailed again, still waiting for refund and supervisor, which actually may not exist with this company. Will NEVER order from this company. Mind you high end clothes not Walmart. Customer service nonexistent

originalText.text: Horrible customer service!!! I will never buy anything from this designer again.  They sent me a pair of shoes with a sharp nail inside that pierced my toe; the shoes were then reduced in price within a few days.  I offered the company to keep the damages shoes (and fix them myself) if they adjust the price.  The asked me to provide a photo of the damage.  No matter how hard I tried to explain to customer service that it's impossible to take a picture of a tiny nail all the way inside a pointy show, they wouldn't listen.  I am returning the shoes and will never shop Veronica Beard again.
